column4: I just used wubi to try Ubuntu on my laptop, but the battery performance is very poor, is it possible to improve it?
My belief is that Ubuntu is an OS, not Window application.  But in the terms, it's always possible to improve by cutting down running services, adjust led brightness, etc.
Some things -- you can use.   http://www.lesswatts.org/

By the way, you're running Wubi so right now, Ubuntu is running on NTFS partition (That's Windows native filesystem, not linux) and it could explains for slightly reduced performances and fast power consumption, etc.
